# Base

> Base ndarray.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var ns = require( '@stdlib/ndarray/base' );
```

#### ns

Base ndarray.

```javascript
var o = ns;
// returns {...}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->
